about_the_game:
Coromon: Rogue Planet combines the rich strategy of tactical turn-based combat from Coromon with strategic rogue-like gameplay to create an endlessly-replayable monster taming gameplay experience.

Explore a variety of over 15 ever-changing biomes! Make tactical decisions on which paths to take as you navigate across the planet of Velua, weighing risk and reward. Each biome contains its own story, new and interesting challenges, as well as its own biosphere of Coromon. Procedurally-generated maps, encounters, and rewards ensure that every run progresses the story while feeling fresh and new.

Unlock 7 different playable characters, each with their own starter, story, and playstyle! As you navigate your way through Velua’s diverse wildlands, you’ll find other trainers in need of your help. Join forces with them to permanently unlock them as a playable character, mastering each character’s unique playstyle and mechanics as you battle alongside a team of Coromon. As you complete milestone goals, you’ll discover their stories and gain new bonuses for every successive run!

Choose one of 7 brand-new starter Coromon, then battle, catch, and tame over 130 monsters! Each Coromon has a unique blend of elemental affinities, personality traits, and skills. Work together with your team of Coromon to improve their skills, tailor their moveset, and grow their power, then battle against wild Coromon, trainers, hordes, and more!

Discover more about the strange origins of the Crimsonite plague threatening Velua! On your travels, you’ll encounter creatures infected by Crimsonite—a dangerous, volatile substance which spreads to anything it touches, consuming elemental energy. Your Coromon can contract the infection, leading to thrilling, high-risk, high-reward gameplay, making them more resilient... but not without risk. As the infection increases in strength, your Coromon will grow more and more disobedient. If left untreated, they’ll become uncontrollable and flee. So be careful out there!

Use a variety of gadgets to customize your capabilities! A meta-progression system allows you to consistently improve your skills and abilities, becoming increasingly powerful over time. Allocate and use accrued resources to improve your hub area and unlock new skills and abilities. You’ll need a combination of luck and skill to survive the Veluan wilderness!

Collect resources to further Lux Solis’ journey to the stars! On your travels, you’ll encounter the mysterious remains of an interstellar spaceship. Each time you bring back new information and resources from these encounters, not only will Lux Solis reward you with additional funding, but you’ll be working together with every other player to progress a global narrative and unlock the secrets of the galaxy!

*Artwork shown not final
